description: Uncovered values tracking for normalized fields

fields.name: field_name
fields.description: Field name: product_item, pattern, color, shape, material, style

fields.name: original_value
fields.description: Original value not found in mapping table

fields.name: product_count
fields.description: Number of products with this value

fields.name: cumulative_product_count
fields.description: Cumulative product count ordered by product_count DESC

fields.name: first_seen_dt
fields.description: First date this uncovered value was seen

fields.name: last_seen_dt
fields.description: Most recent date this uncovered value was seen

fields.name: days_uncovered
fields.description: Number of days value has been uncovered: DATE_DIFF(last_seen_dt, first_seen_dt, DAY) + 1
